Adventure Guildsman:
There is a scientist who seek to awaken an acoent evil force inside the Talking Island Labirinth! He succeeded in incubating the evil force, bit was discovere before the incubation was complete. Then the evil force escaped! Do you know who I`m talking about? Sakum!
Aah... The is no time to explain everything now. Go to the Wasteland and investigate the ferocius monsters that are appearing there!
Now is time for us adventurers to step up to the plate, you included!
